inputs.remark:
Ordered list: ABR and ASSR missing.
Speech audiometry: Left ear WRS very poor (26â€“28% at 92 dB HL). Right ear WRS missing.
Timeline: Expected outcome should belong to V2.

logic_summary: Added ABR and ASSR to the ordered list of investigations.
Updated Speech audiometry results to include missing Right Ear WRS (80% at 66 dB HL) and updated Left Ear WRS to 26-28% as per remarks.
Moved the content of expected_outcome to a new visit V2 in expected_interpretations_by_visit and cleared the expected_outcome field.

patch_ops.value: Right ear SRT (26 dB HL) elevated compared to PTA (poor agreement); WRS 80% at 66 dB HL. Left ear SRT (56 dB HL) agrees with voluntary PTA but WRS is very poor (26-28% at 92 dB HL).

value.collective_interpretation: ASSR test results indicated hearing to be within normal limits in the right ear and a mild to moderate hearing loss in the left ear at 250 to 2000 Hz. ABR waveforms were established with Wave V peaks identified at 40 dB nHL bilaterally, indicating no more than a mild hearing loss in either ear between 2000 and 4000 Hz. The patient was counseled regarding the results and that a functional hearing loss was suspected. The patient was referred for a repeat audiogram.

tests.name: Auditory Steady-State Response (ASSR)
tests.result_summary: Right ear within normal limits. Left ear mild to moderate hearing loss at 250-2000 Hz.

tests.name: Auditory Brainstem Response (ABR)
tests.result_summary: Wave V peaks identified at 40 dB nHL bilaterally, indicating no more than mild hearing loss between 2000-4000 Hz.
